author: rhuijben
msg: Make schedule_existing_item_for_re_add() in update_editor.c look more
similar to mark_tree_copied in adm_ops.c in preparation for integrating
these functions with about the same function into each other.
(set_copied_baton_t): Update comment and store a db instead of the
(schedule_existing_item_for_re_add): Update docstring and take a db
instead of an entry and an edit baton. Retrieve the entry locally
that was retrieved by the caller.
(do_entry_deletion): Update caller. Retrieve kind instead of entry.

msg: update path to "official" svn from /opt. If infra updates subversion-current we need to update again.
